sentences.en: Beeswax acts as an emulsifying agent.
sentences.cn: 蜂蜡起到乳化剂的作用。

sentences.en: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agent from £240.
sentences.cn: 收费低廉的旅行社可以提供240英镑起的低价机票。

sentences.en: He worked in a travel agent's.
He works in a travel agent's.
My agent has instructed me that you still owe me ￡50.
sentences.cn: 我的代理人通知我,你还欠我50英镑.

sentences.en: My agent told me, "This'll make your name a household word."
sentences.cn: 我的经纪人告诉我：“这将使你一举成名。”

sentences.en: Our agent in Rio deals with all our Brazilian business.
sentences.cn: 我们在里约热内卢的业务代表处理我们在巴西的全部业务。

sentences.en: Remember, the estate agent is working for the vendor.
sentences.cn: 记住，房地产代理商是为房地产卖方服务的。

sentences.en: She was a free agent, answerable to no one for her behaviour.
sentences.cn: 她是个自由分子，言行不受任何人约束。

sentences.en: The agent priced the car at the right level for the market.
sentences.cn: 代理商按市场价格给这车子定了价.

sentences.en: The agent spied for East Germany for more than twenty years.
sentences.cn: 该特工人员为东德做了20多年的间谍。

sentences.en: The house was terribly small and cramped, but the agent described it as a bijou residence.
sentences.cn: 房子十分狭小拥挤，但经纪人却把它说成是小巧别致的住宅。

sentences.en: We soon found out that he was a secret agent.
sentences.cn: 我们很快就查明他是个间谍.

sentences.en: We talked to her agent. He's your agent, too, right?
sentences.cn: 我们和她的经纪人谈过了。他也是你的经纪人，对吧？

sentences.en: We went straight to the estate agent and wrote out a cheque.
sentences.cn: 我们径直到房地产经纪人那里开了一张支票。

words.tran_cn: 代理，中介；代理处，经销处

phrases.tran_cn: 房地产掮客，房地产经纪人
无自由约束的职业队员
n. 总代理商；独家经营商；包销人
旅行社；旅行代理人，旅行代办人

trans.tran_cn: 代理人/商，经纪人，间谍，动力，（化学）剂，行为主体
trans.tran_en: a person or company that represents another person or company, especially in business
